headline.main: Trump's Shifting Positions Since U.S. Election Win
headline.print_headline: Trump's Shifting Positions Since U.S. Election Win

docs.snippet: After firing up crowds with boisterous and sometimes divisive campaign rhetoric, Donald Trump has appeared to moderate some stances since he won the U.S. presidential election on Nov. 8....
docs.lead_paragraph: After firing up crowds with boisterous and sometimes divisive campaign rhetoric, Donald Trump has appeared to moderate some stances since he won the U.S. presidential election on Nov. 8.

headline.main: China to Tighten Control on Domestic Firms' Foreign Investment: WSJ
headline.print_headline: China to Tighten Control on Domestic Firms' Foreign Investment: WSJ

docs.snippet: China plans to tighten controls on Chinese companies looking to invest abroad, in an effort to slow a surge of capital fleeing offshore, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing documents it reviewed and sources familiar with the ma...
docs.lead_paragraph: China plans to tighten controls on Chinese companies looking to invest abroad, in an effort to slow a surge of capital fleeing offshore, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing documents it reviewed and sources familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Coats Given Away at Rhode Island Statehouse on Black Friday
headline.print_headline: Coats Given Away at Rhode Island Statehouse on Black Friday

docs.snippet: While shoppers are spending Black Friday at the mall, hundreds of people in need are picking winter coats off racks on the Rhode Island Statehouse lawn for Buy Nothing Day....
docs.lead_paragraph: While shoppers are spending Black Friday at the mall, hundreds of people in need are picking winter coats off racks on the Rhode Island Statehouse lawn for Buy Nothing Day.

headline.main: Putin Presents Russian Passport to Hollywood Actor Seagal
headline.print_headline: Putin Presents Russian Passport to Hollywood Actor Seagal

docs.snippet: Russian President Vladimir Putin presented a Russian passport to U.S. actor Steven Seagal on Friday and said he hoped it would serve as a symbol of how the fractious ties between Moscow and Washington are starting to improve....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian President Vladimir Putin presented a Russian passport to U.S. actor Steven Seagal on Friday and said he hoped it would serve as a symbol of how the fractious ties between Moscow and Washington are starting to improve.

headline.main: India's Dance Bar Owners Confident Top Court Will End Decade-Long Ban
headline.print_headline: India's Dance Bar Owners Confident Top Court Will End Decade-Long Ban

docs.snippet: Owners of scores of illegal dance bars in India's financial capital Mumbai said on Friday they were confident a ruling by the top court would finally end a decade-long ban which has left up to 75,000 bar dancers, singers and waiters without jobs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Owners of scores of illegal dance bars in India's financial capital Mumbai said on Friday they were confident a ruling by the top court would finally end a decade-long ban which has left up to 75,000 bar dancers, singers and waiters without jobs.

headline.main: Arabic Signs Face Removal Threat in Istanbul's Little Syria
headline.print_headline: Arabic Signs Face Removal Threat in Istanbul's Little Syria

docs.snippet: With its colorful signs, flashing lights and awnings displaying sales messages in Arabic, Istanbul's Aksaray neighborhood looks just like its nickname, "Little Syria."...
docs.lead_paragraph: With its colorful signs, flashing lights and awnings displaying sales messages in Arabic, Istanbul's Aksaray neighborhood looks just like its nickname, "Little Syria."

headline.main: US Stocks Rise to Fresh Records in Shortened Session
headline.print_headline: US Stocks Rise to Fresh Records in Shortened Session

docs.snippet: Stocks hit fresh records in a shortened trading session Friday as investors continued to bet on a pickup in economic growth and rising corporate profits....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stocks hit fresh records in a shortened trading session Friday as investors continued to bet on a pickup in economic growth and rising corporate profits.
